entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then showers beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
